short_summary: Aviation Replacement Parts for the CC138 Twin Otter
tags: Automatic Pilot Mechanisms and Airborne Gyro Components
full_summary:
### Aviation Replacement Parts for CC138 Twin Otter

**Procurement Reference Number:** PW-23-01024093

**Procurement Oppourtunity ID:** W8485-237533/A

#### Overview

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking proposals from qualified [Supply Arrangement (SA)] holders for the procurement of aviation replacement parts for the CC138 Twin Otter.

#### Scope of Work

The scope of work for this Supply Arrangement is to provide aviation replacement parts for the CC138 Twin Otter aircraft for the Department of National Defence (DND). This includes the acquisition of 4 items.

#### Proposal Process

This Request for Proposal (RFP) is open only to qualified SA holders of Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 series. 

The selected companies invited to submit a proposal are:

* Aero Precision Industries LLC
* JHT Defense Inc.
* Mills/Sterling Aerospace Inc. 
* Patlon Aircraft & Industries Ltd.
* Simex Defence Inc.
* Tower Aerospace Inc.
* Unisource Technology Inc.
* L3 Technologies MAS Inc.
* Tronosjet Maintenance Inc.
* Tulmar Safety
* Canada West Avionics
* Mattis Aerospace
* PAL Aerospace
* CSP
* Bristow

#### Tender Description

Proposal documents will be e-mailed directly to the invited bidders.

Inquiries regarding this RFP requirement are to be submitted to:

June Cole
Aerospace Equipment Program Management (DGAEPM)
Department of National Defence (DND) / Government of Canada
455, Boulvard de la carrière, Gatineau (QC) J8Y 6V7
June.Cole@forces.gc.ca

Please note that our Division is teleworking during the COVID-19 pandemic. The best way to contact us is by email.

## Important Dates

* Tender closing date: Monday, 2023-02-14T14:00:00
* Procurement document: Available by email.

### Notice:

Note that the Supply Arrangement holder's accounts must be updated in the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) before proposal submission. Annual qualification notice will be posted on the Service to allow more suppliers to become qualified for the Supply Arrangement. Suppliers interested in becoming pre-qualified can contact the Supply Arrangement Authority listed above.

#### Classification of Goods

* Airframe Structural Components
* Automatic Pilot Mechanisms and Airborne Gyro Components
